description: Situated on the edge of old Milan, this former bakery has been converted into a tiny restaurant serving vegetarian cuisine in a contemporary-style setting. The two tasting menus include delicious, colourful and beautifully presented dishes which can also be ordered à la carte. Booking is essential.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
